description: A Flutter widget implementing a registration screen with form validation, state management via Riverpod, and UI elements tailored for user registration.

classes.name: RegisterScreen
classes.description: A Flutter ConsumerStatefulWidget that provides user registration UI and logic.

classes.description: State class managing the registration form, input fields, validation, and interaction with authentication provider.

methods.description: Builds the registration screen UI, including form fields, validation, and submit handling.
